text: As-salaamu Alaikum my sister ü•∞ü•∫I just wanted to take a moment to express how deeply grateful I am for everything you‚Äôve done for me. Your constant support on TikTok, the gifts, the advice, and the prayers mean so much to me. You‚Äôve been a source of strength and kindness, and I can‚Äôt thank you enough for always believing in me‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.. You‚Äôve gone beyond what I could ever expect, even planning to get me a new MacBook. That‚Äôs truly generous and thoughtful, and it shows what a beautiful heart you have. May Allah reward you abundantly for every good deed you‚Äôve done‚Ä¶‚Ä¶. I pray for you and your family every day. May Allah bless you with peace, strength, and ease, especially during this challenging time of your divorce. May He guide you through it and make everything smooth and easy for you. May He protect your children, grant them happiness, and surround them with love and success. May He shower your entire family with endless blessings and provide you with a life full of joy, prosperity, and contentment‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.. I just want you to know that I‚Äôm truly grateful for all you‚Äôve done, and I‚Äôm praying for the best for you in every aspect of your life‚Ä¶‚Ä¶Jazakallahu khairan, and may Allah always be with you
